docs.abstract: Health and Human Services Sec Sylvia Mathews Burwell says during House Ways and Means Committee hearing that Congress and state officials will have to devise solution if Supreme Court stops payment of health insurance subsidies to millions of Americans.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tokio Marine Holdings Inc said on Wednesday it had agreed to buy U.S. specialty insurer HCC Insurance Holdings Inc for $7.5 billion, in what would be the biggest M&A deal this year by a Japanese company.
